properties.description:
Kerberos ticket files (.kirbi) are of interest to adversaries as they can contain sensitive data such as NTLM hashes that can be cracked offline. 

To perform these attacks, a unique file extension variable is defined within Mimikatz that designates the default extension as .kirbi.

Modification of files with this extension can be a telltale sign that an adversary is in the midst of performing an attack such as "Kerberoasting"

alertDetailsOverride.alertDisplayNameFormat: Kerberos ticket files (.kirbi) being created/modified on {{Hostname}} by {{InitiatingProcessAccountName}}
